issue.description: NC_000079.5:83764759 is an 'A', resulting in a non-consensus -AA splice acceptor for NM_001170537.1:837
issue.resolution_text: The addition of CT025631.2 as a replacement for WGS CAAA01214711.1 has resolved the issue of a non-consensus -AA splice acceptor at position 83,764,759 in NC_000079.5

issue.summary: clone name RP23-191J8 is assigned to both CT030195 and CT030156
issue.description: The clone name RP23-191J8 assigned to this accession CT030195 is also assigned to CT030156
issue.resolution_text: Clone information in Genbank has been changed from CT030156.9/RP23-191J8 to CT030156.11/RP23-338M13

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC124460.5
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC124460.5
issue.resolution_text: A new switchpoint has been curated to include all of BX001068's sequence in the overlap, fixing the mismatch at Build37 position 21,480,526.

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC096628.14
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC096628.14
issue.resolution_text: A new switchpoint was curated to include the correct base in the Reference (T at position 47,178,427 (in AC154171)).

issue.description: Chromosome 13 sequence does not extend into telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: The addition of AC225446.3 to the Mouse Chrom. 13 TPF removes the pre-telomeric gap between AC239678.2 and the telomere.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL589742.21.
issue.status_text: The reference has been verified, but the existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL589742.21. The Reference Sequence at position 21560172 of NC_000079.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC238811.3 and AC238940.3.
issue.resolution_text: The gap has been removed in the TPF between components AC238811.3 and AC238940.3. An overlap certificate has been submitted for the AC238811.3/AC238940.3 overlap.

issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between CT033783.5 and CT571266.5
issue.resolution_text: The gap originally between the two components CT033783.5 and CT571266.5 was removed resulting in a green-ball join.

issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between components AC154624.2 and AC138401.9
issue.resolution_text: CT025627.2 was sequenced to close a gap between accessions AC154624.2 and AC138401.9 previously occupied by WGS CAAA01175365.1-CAAA01208063.1 (8 pieces total).

issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between components AC154788.2 and AC112671.25
issue.resolution_text: CT025627.2 was sequenced to close a gap between accessions AC154624.2 and AC138401.9, replacing CAAA01191699.1 and CAAA01210796.1.

issue.summary: Chrom. 13 Reference Assembly replacement of WGS
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has WGS CAAA01070929.1 spanning a gap between components CT009711.11 and AC154824.2
issue.resolution_text: AC207128.3 was sequenced to replace a gap between CT009711.11 and AC154824.2 once occupied by WGS CAAA01070929.1.

issue.summary: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 13 unlocalized scaffold NT_110857.1?
issue.description: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 13 unlocalized scaffold NT_110857.1 in future assemblies?
issue.resolution_text: The underlying component of NT_110857.1 (AC123738.8) has been added to the TPF near the distal end of chr. 13

issue.description: AC129084.8 is working draft sequence in the Build 37 chromosome 13 reference.

issue.description: CT009757.23 is working draft sequence in the Build 37 chromosome 13 reference.
issue.resolution_text: This clone has been finished and submitted as complete sequence with accession CT009757.28

issue.description: There is an IS150 and one copy of the flanking target site duplication in UK-MRC clone AL589742.21
issue.resolution_text: AL589742.21 now has the IS150 element and one copy of the flanking target site duplication excised. It has been updated to version AL589742.22.

issue.description: CT025605.11 (RP23-259D11) is redundant in NC_000070.5
issue.resolution_text: CT025605.11 (RP23-259D11) has been removed from the TPF as it is redundant with components AC154792.2 and AC161585.2.

issue.summary: Assembly component CT030187.7 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component CT030187.7 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: Although there was an accession.version update in CT030187 (CT030187.6 to CT030187.7), no further GRC curation is needed in this region. CT030187.7's overlaps with TPF neighboring components CT033774.17 and CT030184.14 are unaffected as both have 100% overlap with CT030187.7.

issue.description: GeneID: 639910 (LOC639910) is missing in the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: NM_001039648.3 is supported by multiple transcripts and aligns 100% to Chr. 13 component AC238940.3.
